description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Junior Street Ninja is a 2d platformer game with a authentic Asian soundtrack & fast & fun game play. The young ninja is named Sheng-Li who must pass a series of test that will prove that he is a skilled & intelligent fighter without using any weapons so that he can rightfully earn the title of "first born ".
